casebody.data:
In the Matter of YELVERTON. No. 376P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 12, 2006. Phillip A. Baddour, Jr., Goldsboro, for Kelvin Artis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of September 2006 by Caveator (Mansel Yelverton) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of September 2006."
